title: Council Decision of 11 October 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 11 October 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
(93/C 284/02)THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/385/EEC of 10 June 1985 setting up an Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas by its decision of 20 June 1991 (2), the Council appointed Mr Christian THIEME an alternate member for the period ending 19 June 1994;
Whereas the German Government has nominated Mr Klaus GROTH to replace Mr Christian THIEME,
main_body: Mr Klaus GROTH is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr Christian THIEME for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 19 June 1994.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 11 October 1993.
For the Council
The President
J.-M. DEHOUSSE
(1) OJ No L 223, 21. 8. 1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ No C 182, 13. 7. 1991, p. 1.
